965.question: Which hyperparameters were varied in the experiments on the four tasks?

3-Table1-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are the number of clusters, word embeddings dimension, and window size.
4-Table3-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks were the type of word embeddings and the number of clusters.
3-Table2-1.png: The number of clusters was varied in the experiments on the four tasks.
5-Table5-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks include the number of clusters, type of word embeddings (e.g., skipgram100, us5), and the size of the clusters. The results show that different types of word embeddings and number of clusters can affect the performance of fine-grained sentiment quantification.

965.answer: number of clusters, seed value in clustering, selection of word vectors, window size and dimension of embedding
